/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape below. The street, teeming with life, is filled with cars and buses, their colors muted under the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades a testament to the architectural diversity of the city. Amidst the concrete structures, patches of greenery peek through, offering a touch of nature amidst the urban sprawl. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the hustle and bustle of city life.
